mapper.select: select * from device d where d.dvc_seq = #{devSeq};

select service.svc_seq as "serviceTargetSeq", company.external_id as "external", device.dvc_seq as "deviceSeq", model.model_code as "modelTypeCode", model.model_id as "modelId", device.dvc_name as "deviceName" from service, customer, device, model, company where device.cust_id = #{userId} and device.cust_id = customer.cust_id and service.cust_id = customer.cust_id and device.model_id = model.model_id and model.comp_id = company.comp_id
